name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat Maestro ChatGPT - Folders, Prompts & Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Organizer with folders, reusable prompts, and powerful search across your entire chat history!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📁 Folders: Organize conversations into color-coded categories
🔍 Smart Search: Quickly find chats by titles and messages
📝 Prompt Library: Create and manage custom templates with variables
🔄 Auto Sync: Organize and search over ALL your past chats, while we sync everything on every new chat and message

🔒 Privacy First:
Your data stays local in your browser. We never send or store your information.

💯 Free & Unlimited:
Enjoy all features without restrictions while we're in beta!

⌨️ Keyboard friendly:
Configurable shortcuts available for opening Smart Search and Prompt Library. Or just click a button on the website.

👥 Perfect for:
• Professionals with multiple projects
• Shared ChatGPT account users
• Anyone aiming to boost their ChatGPT efficiency

🔮 Coming Soon:
We're developing similar tools for Claude and Gemini. Get ready for seamless cross-platform AI chat management!

🚀 Download Chat Maestro now and start using ChatGPT like a pro!
